column6: Through thick and thin, for better or for worse, Mary Jane Watson-Parker has always stood by her man's side, supporting him in all his decisions. But as Peter's latest choices have cost him and his family plenty-perhaps too much-has MJ finally reached the breaking point?
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | penciller:Sean Chen | penciller (cover):Clayton Crain | colorist:Dan Kemp | letterer:Cory Petit
